name: AutoPilot (Angry Duck)
description:
you are testing a new autopilot when it malfunctions, you must now fight waves of enemies while being controlled by the broken AI.

(its an arcade game this is just some head cannon of mine)

Quick Disarmer, this was made by person focused on modeling, and someone focused on programing. due to some complications, the modeler had  to do ALL the programing you see in the game in one night.
